sentences.sContent: What else ___ you ___(do)? –I ____(watch)the fireworks and dragon dances in.
sentences.sContent_eng: What else ___ you ___(do)? –I ____(watch)the fireworks and dragon dances in.
sentences.sCn: 你还做了什么？-我在街上观看了烟花和舞龙。

sentences.sContent: Fireworks shows are popular around the world. But if I do not end this program right now, there will be fireworks from my producer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fireworks shows are popular around the world. But if I do not end this program right now, there will be fireworks from my producer.
sentences.sCn: 烟火盛会在全世界都受欢迎，但如果我不马上结束这期节目的话，我的制作人就要发火了。

synos.tran: 烟火（firework的复数形式）；激烈争论

phrases.pCn: 烟花汇演，烟火表演；施放烟火

remMethod.val: fire(火)+work(工作)+s→让火用另一种方式动起来→烟火

trans.tranOther: a show in which large numbers of fireworks are let off simultaneously
